description: Java interface for managing notes, defining methods for note creation, retrieval, listing, updating, and deletion.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Interface for note management operations in the notes backend.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the provided request data.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists notes with pagination and optional search query.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by id.
